subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Three generations removed from the separate and unequal worlds of their great-grandfathers, Babe Ruth and Josh Gibson, Sean Gibson and Brent Stevens have forged a friendship and a marketing alliance.
snippet: Three generations removed from the separate and unequal worlds of their great-grandfathers, Babe Ruth and Josh Gibson, Sean Gibson and Brent Stevens have forged a friendship and a marketing alliance.
